scripts.create-heco-local: cp subgraph.yaml.heco subgraph.yaml; graph create --node http://graph-node:8020/ cBridge/heco
scripts.remove-heco-local: cp subgraph.yaml.heco subgraph.yaml; graph remove --node http://graph-node:8020/ cBridge/heco
scripts.deploy-heco-local: cp subgraph.yaml.heco subgraph.yaml; graph deploy --node http://graph-node:8020/ --ipfs http://ipfs:5001 cBridge/heco
